## MUI Sparkline Chart


### Basics

```Python
from tensorpc.dock import mui, mark_create_layout, chart
class App:
    @mark_create_layout
    def my_layout(self):
        return mui.HBox([
            mui.HBox([
                chart.SparkLineChart().prop(data=[1, 4, 2, 5, 7, 2, 4, 6])
            ]).prop(flex=1),
            mui.HBox([
                chart.SparkLineChart().prop(
                    data=[1, 4, 2, 5, 7, 2, 4, 6],
                    plotType="bar",
                )
            ]).prop(flex=1),
        ]).prop(flex=1)

```
